department: College of Computing and Digital Media
biography:
Originating from Seattle, WA, Brian is a Writer/Director, Videographer, and Post-Production Specialist. He just finished his thesis film "Spark and Fade" in the Spring of 2014. "Spark and Fade" recently played at the East Lansing Film Festival in Michigan and won an award at the Illinois International Film Festival. It will also play at the FirstGlance Film Festival in Philadelphia and the Route 66 Film Festival. 

Outside of teaching he does freelance video editing and videography in Chicago.
